summary: Provides a manager that extracts and processes container image references from Kustomize configuration files, leveraging a generic graph‑based image referencer framework and a Kustomize‑specific provider to build and query an image dependency graph.
business_intent: Enables security and compliance tools to discover all container images defined in Kustomize manifests so they can be scanned for vulnerabilities, checked against policies, and tracked across infrastructure‑as‑code deployments.
